attributes.action: All new covid restrictions should be voted in by the public
attributes.additional_details:
I struggle with depression and anxiety like alot of others, I feel my government has failed me and the rest of Britain in tackling this virus head on, but feels they can blame us, when no effective plans have been put into place, 
Another lockdown will take more lives than it saves, in suicides alone, by giving the public a say in how we proceed. We all won't feel helpless, while a bunch of over paid liars. Play poker with our lives
attributes.background: Stop making radical changes to our lives with out it being voted in by the general public, we have the right to choose how we live. We pay our taxes, and should be a part of the process.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
